reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the development of China's legal system to help improve the business environment

description.narrative: This project is designed to draw on UK expertise to strengthen the process of legal and judicial reform in China in a manner that helps to promote the rule of law as well as improve the business environment. It will do this by developing a new UK-China legal and judicial cooperation mechanism which will enable both sides to address common legal and judicial challenges arising from economic development and the advance of technology. This will generate opportunities for international business, including UK ones in the legal and judicial sector.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
